title: Snow Day Syndra Q
body: When I play Snow Day Syndra, I'm not seeing the snowflake below her Q when she places it while using the skin.

replies.body:
Hey Damenger! 

Thanks for the report! 

Just took a look at this again on live, and I'm seeing it properly. Which graphics settings are you using? I was on High in the match I was just in.
It may be dependent on your graphic settings. Try tweaking with your graphic options and cast Q in a custom game.
